summary: This is a calendar entry for a hearing on Jeffrey Epstein's motion to quash, scheduled for September 18, 2007, before Judge Marra. It appears to be an internal court scheduling document.

persons.name: Judge Marra
persons.context: The hearing on Jeffrey Epstein's motion to quash is scheduled to take place in Judge Marra's courtroom.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the motion to quash that is the basis for the scheduled hearing.

connections.description: Judge Marra is presiding over a hearing on a motion filed by Epstein's defense team.

events.title: Hearing on Epstein Motion to Quash
events.description: A court hearing scheduled to address a motion to quash filed by Jeffrey Epstein's legal team.

keyFacts: A hearing on a motion to quash filed by Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for September 18, 2007.
The hearing was to be presided over by Judge Marra.
The document is a calendar entry, indicating it was an internal scheduling record for the court.
